entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few flurries beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning then light this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
